name: Quarantennis
description:
• Quarantennis is an arcade-y game, inspired by the Game Boy Color aesthetics and this period of social distancing, so defining of 2020
  • You can play against a friend (or foe! or whoever you like!) in local multiplayer, which I recommend, or against the computer-controlled computer (nope, that's not a typo, that's the way it is)
How to play:
  • If you throw the ball and your opponent can't answer it, you get a point. The first player to get to 10 points, wins the match
  • A lob sends the ball upwards, a smash sends it downwards, and a slice sends it to the middle
Controls: ACTIONPLAYER ONEPLAYER TWOClimb UpUp ArrowWClimb Down Down ArrowS LobRight ArrowASmash Left ArrowD Slice NO KEY PRESS Pause  ESC Reviews:
  • "Wow, nice game. I'm really proud of you" - my mom
  • "I wanna be a game developer like you. I love this game!" - a friend of mine 
  • "Meh, I lost. What a crappy game" - my brother
  • "I never want to stop playing this! A 10/10" - definitely real person, not fabricated by me. It exists, trust me
  • "Who the #@*% are you?" - some internet guy when I asked for his review
